title: PM grieved over life loss in Egypt church fire
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 15 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday expressed grief over the loss of lives in a tragic fire incident that broke out in Abu Sefein Church in Giza, Egypt.
The prime minister on behalf of the people of Pakistan, extended his condolences to Egyptâ€™s president Abdel Alfattah Al-Sissi and families of the deceased.
He prayed for the speedy recovery of the injured.
An electrical fire swept through an Egyptian Coptic Christian church during Mass on Sunday, causing a stampede and killing at least 41 people, most of them children and many suffering from smoke inhalation, the Reuters said.
